subject: Re: Order #SSN3827, how did it go?
description_text:
I haven't received it yet... I would like some updates...

El mar, 16 dic 2025, 22:50, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escribió:

> Hello Ignacio Ricardo, We would be grateful if you shared how things look
> and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it
> only takes a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

>
> We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review
> helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few
> seconds.

> Optional]

conversations.body_text: Hi warrendongo5,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Currently, our German warehouse is out of stock for the footrest, with restocking expected today. We will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fee you paid.
